inclusion.criterion: Presence of bone and/or soft-tissue and/or visceral metastases
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Progressive disease assessed by PSA, CT scan, MRI or bone scan
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with no or moderate symptoms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Effective castration confirmed by testosterone plasma level < 50 ng/dL
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patient affiliate to french social assurance
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: SGPT and SGOT < 5 fold the upper normal value
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pure small cell carcinoma of the prostate or predominant histology of neuro-endocrine carcinoma
exclusion.label: triggers
